page.title: 19Local Amenities
page.content: {West Wickham Swimming Pool.} The main pool was built in 1967 and the teaching pool five years after.The main pool is 33.3 by 12.5 metres and ranges from 0.9 to 3 metres deep. There are three diving boards:1,3 and 5 metre.The balcony seats 200 spectators. The pool holds 400,000 gallons of water and is emptied and cleared once a year.294,800 people swim each year. There are 32 staff from room attendants to manager. Carol Daniels, Hawes Down. {The Library in Shirley.} In the lending library in Shirley, the reference section has about 315 books. The borrowing section for adults has about 17000 books. The reading room has nine different daily papers. There are no tapes or records in the child- ren's section, but about 5000 books. Joanne Woolf, Marian Vian.
